name: TransitStyle
comment:
Animations for elm-transit, to be used on elm-html attributes.

    div
        (fadeSlide 100 model.transition)
        [ text "Some content" ]

    div
        (onClick (Click Page1) :: fadeZoom 0.05 model.transition)
        [ text "Some content" ]


# Combinations

@docs fadeSlide, fadeZoom


# Slide left

@docs slide, slideOut, slideIn


# Fade

@docs fade, fadeOut, fadeIn


# Zoom

@docs zoom, zoomIn, zoomOut


# Tooling to create animations

@docs compose

values.name: compose
values.comment: Compose an animation with `exit` and `enter` phases.
values.type: (Basics.Float -> List.List (Html.Attribute msg)) -> (Basics.Float -> List.List (Html.Attribute msg)) -> Transit.Transition -> List.List (Html.Attribute msg)

values.name: fadeSlide
values.comment: Combine fade and slideLeft with the specified offset

values.name: fadeZoom
values.comment: Combine fade and zoom with specified offset

values.name: slide
values.comment:
Slide animation, with the specified offset.
Greater than 0 to right, lesser to left.

values.name: slideIn
values.comment: Slide in (enter) by translating on X for desired offset

values.name: slideOut
values.comment: Slide out (exit) by translating on X for desired offset
